With the gift of the gab and a serious case of dance fever, Canadian Screen Award Winning host, Carlos Bustamante is back and ready to party on Next Star for the show's seventh season!

As a TV veteran, Carlos has had experiences that most people only dream of, including interviewing some of the biggest names in entertainment like Johnny Depp, Taylor Swift and Justin Bieber. No stranger to the spotlight, Carlos is also a trained dancer who has performed since the age of eight throughout North America, lighting up every stage along the way. A fan favourite for his role as the host of both The Zone and Big Fun Movies on YTV, Carlos is pumped to kick off the new season!
